last_episode_to_air.name: Maria Alice
last_episode_to_air.overview: Paulo, Laura and Cabral toast the return of Maria Alice to Brazil. Laura prepares for the baby's arrival. Paulo and Maria Alice make an announcement that surprises everyone.

name: All Women in the World

next_episode_to_air.name: Pink
next_episode_to_air.overview: While rehearsing for the debut of his play with Pink and Davi, Paulo makes a deal with Maria Alice. Laura's baby is born.

overview: 'All Women in the World' honors the work of Domingos Oliveira. The series brings philosophical reflections on life, love and death with an intelligent and refined humor.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: 'All Women in the World' honors the work of Domingos Oliveira. The series brings philosophical reflections on life, love and death with an intelligent and refined humor.
